text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Wow～ The cafeteria's crowded as usual…! 
Just the teensiest bit late and there's already nowhere to sit…

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
(Oh! There's a couple of open seats over there! 
Yay. Now that's what I call a miracle. ♪)

text_block_list.name: Double Miracle
text_block_list.text: …Oh.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Uh… Hehe. 
Wanna sit together, Miracle-chan?

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Haha… If you're OK with it, sure. 
Thanks for asking, Hishi Miracle.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Phew～ What a meal～♪ 
…Hang on, that flyer!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
It's for the Town Chorus Fest thing, right? 
I just happened to see it on the bulletin board today～

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
…! 
Hishi Miracle… Would you maybe be interested?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Haha, well, I am interested, buuuut, it's more about the prize. Tickets for an all-expenses-paid luxury group trip! Talk about a dream vacation, you know?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Well, uh, I know it's just a little thing set up by the shopping district, but I'm not thinking anything crazy like "Oh, I might actually be able to win this"! I'm not, but…

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
It's just, it was Summer Walk season not too long ago, right? 
Everyone was out doing mini-vacations, recreation, stuff like that, but——

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
All I did was chill out in my room and go total relaxo mode… 
It's kinda too late now, but I'm getting the itch to go on a trip, y'know…?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
…Wait, I sound like a total bum right now, don't I!? 
Hahaha, sorry about that～

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Oh, not at all. Don't worry. 
…Right, the prize…!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Huh? …Uh, Miracle-chan?

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Right. …If you're okay with it, let's try and win together. 
Please——!

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text: …won't you perform with me at the Town Chorus Fest…?

text_block_list.name: Nurse
text_block_list.text: Good thing your fever went down, huh, Kei-chan? But if you start feeling worse, remember to say something. Even though I know you want to stay and listen.

text_block_list.name: Little Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Yeah. I'm okay. 
…Hey. Their singing… It's really beautiful.

text_block_list.name: Little Miracle
text_block_list.text:
They look like they're having so much fun… Hehe. 
I'm starting to having fun too!

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
…Ever since then, I've always remembered. 
The singing that warmed my heart——

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: (If I remember right, Miracle-chan used to be in the hospital most of the time. So this is one of her happy memories from that time…)

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text: The kids who are hospitalized there are going to come watch the Chorus Fest, apparently.

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text: That's why… If I can, this time, I want to be the one to pass that warm singing on to them.

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
But because it's a "choir" fest, I exactly can't do it by myself, so… 
Oh, um! Sorry. It's totally OK if you don't want to.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Oh, no, it's okay! No problem at all. Nope. 
So, uh… Yeah!!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: (…Okay, to be honest? This conversation's way heavier than I thought it'd be! But still! I've at least got to do what I can!)

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: …S-so, the prize trip! It's got free admission to the nearby leisure center, a hotel with a great view, and even a full-course luxury seafood dinner!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
I wanna go! I wanna eat! I wanna chill oooouut!! 
……………So, y'know…

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Let's do our best and win this thing, Miracle-chan!!

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text: Hishi Miracle…

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
——Yeah. 
Yeah… Thanks. Let's do our best…!

text_block_list.name: Calstone Light O
text_block_list.text: So I see we are forming a choir with the five of us. Then let us begin without further delay. In fact let us finish everything between practice and performance right here and now.

text_block_list.name: Calstone Light O
text_block_list.text: But before we begin. Having two Miracles is way too confusing so while we are here you will be Kei-chan and you will be Kuu-chan. Agreed? Agreed.

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text:
……Do not simply take it all in stride!! 
Not the situation, not us, and certainly not these nicknames!!

text_block_list.name: Dantsu Flame
text_block_list.text:
Aha… hahaha… Uhhhhh, for now, how about… 
Thanks for having us, Miracle-senpai… 
…I guess?

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
G-good to have you… So, um…? 
Hishi Miracle, what's going on here…?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Hang on. I'm as totally lost as you are… 
First things first, I invited Dantsu-chan!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
I figured it'd be better to have a bit of a bigger group… 
Dantsu-chan's the nicest roommate I could ever ask for, so I thought maybe she'd be willing to join us. Hehe.

text_block_list.name: Dantsu Flame
text_block_list.text: Oh, you don't need to talk me up like that. You're the nice roommate here, Mirako-senpai. Besides, being in a choir with everyone sounds like a lot of fun!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Oh, gee, you're such a good, good girl～ 
…Anyway. Everything up to that makes sense, but… 
What's the deal with Durandal-chan and Light O-chan?

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text: We were informed through conversation with Dantsu-san while cleaning the classroom. It is only natural for a knight to jump at the opportunity to perform such a noble task for the youth.

text_block_list.name: Calstone Light O
text_block_list.text: So basically she thought it seemed like a pretty good thing to do and sounded very fun and so she tagged along. I did too by the way.

text_block_list.name: Durandal
text_block_list.text: I would prefer if you did not equate us!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: L- looks like we've added some strong personalities to the group… Sorry for letting them in without asking, Miracle-chan…

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text: Hahaha! Don't worry! I was just thinking, this going to be a really fun group, that's all. Makes me want to tell the kids right away.

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Dantsu, Light O, Durandal. Thank you all for coming. 
I'd love to be in the Chorus Fest with all of you.

text_block_list.name: Calstone Light O
text_block_list.text:
Yes very good. You can count on me lots, Kei-chan. 
You too Kuu-chan.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Oh, I guess we're actually doing the nickname thing…?

text_block_list.name: Calstone Light O
text_block_list.text: Anyway. Without further ado the choir "Team Miraclez" sets their sights on the Chorus Fest!!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Oh. I guess that's our group name now…?
